def_cn: 强壮的;健壮的;力气大的
def_en: Someone who is strong is healthy with good muscles and can move or carry heavy things, or do hard physical work.

def_cn: (人)坚定的，坚决的，自信的
def_en: Someone who is strong is confident and determined, and is not easily influenced or worried by other people.

def_cn: 不易损坏的;坚固的;结实的
def_en: Strong objects or materials are not easily broken and can support a lot of weight or resist a lot of strain.

def_cn: (风、水流等)强劲的，迅猛的，狂奔的
def_en: A strong wind, current, or other force has a lot of power or speed, and can cause heavy things to move.

def_cn: (印象、影响)强烈的，深刻的
def_en: A strong impression or influence has a great effect on someone.

def_cn: (观点、措辞)坚定的，强烈的，不动摇的
def_en: If you have strong opinions on something or express them using strong words, you have extreme or very definite opinions which you are willing to express or defend.

def_cn: (当权者的行为)坚定的，强硬的，严厉的，不动摇的
def_en: If someone in authority takes strong action, they act firmly and severely.

def_cn: (理由、论据)有说服力的，强有力的，充分的
def_en: If there is a strong case or argument for something, it is supported by a lot of evidence.

def_cn: (可能性、机会)极大的
def_en: If there is a strong possibility or chance that something is true or will happen, it is very likely to be true or to happen.

def_cn: 优秀的;精通的;擅长的
def_en: Your strong points are your best qualities or talents, or the things you are good at.

def_cn: (竞争者、候选人、队伍)强大的，有望成功的，有实力的
def_en: A strong competitor, candidate, or team is good or likely to succeed.

def_cn: (关系)稳固的，持久的，牢固的
def_en: If a relationship or link is strong, it is close and likely to last for a long time.

def_cn: (货币)坚挺的;(经济)强劲的;(行业)景气的
def_en: A strong currency, economy, or industry has a high value or is very successful.

def_cn: (因素、成分)重要的，占很大比例的
def_en: If something is a strong element or part of something else, it is an important or large part of it.

def_cn: 大量的;众多的;多达…的
def_en: You can use strong when you are saying how many people there are in a group. For example, if a group is twenty strong, there are twenty people in it.

def_cn: (饮品、化学品、药物)含量高的，浓的，酽的
def_en: A strong drink, chemical, or drug contains a lot of the particular substance which makes it effective.

def_cn: 醒目的;响亮的;浓烈的;强烈的
def_en: A strong colour, flavour, smell, sound, or light is intense and easily noticed.

def_cn: (口音)浓重的
def_en: If someone has a strong accent, they speak in a distinctive way that shows very clearly what country or region they come from.

def_cn: (面貌)轮廓分明的
def_en: You can say that someone has strong features or a strong face if their face has large, distinctive features.

def_cn: 言行过分;情绪激烈
def_en: If someone comes on strong, they make their intentions or feelings clear in an excessive or aggressive way.

def_cn: 保持健康;依旧活跃;兴盛不衰
def_en: If someone or something is still going strong, they are still alive, in good condition, or popular after a long time.
